definition: malign agent who manipulates from behind the scenes/hidden hand
the whole truth is revealed (idiom); everything becomes clear
to punish according to the law/to bring to justice
as the water recedes, the rocks appear (idiom)/the truth comes to light
to try to find out/to trace/to track down

to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
